BasicInfo.short: QUANTIL is a content delivery network with over 650 Points of Presence (PoPs), and a data throughput over 30 Tbps.

Products.name: Video Acceleration
Products.description: Our Media Center relays video from your origin to our edge nodes. The edge nodes serve the requested format to your user.

Products.name: Mobile Acceleration
Products.description: Our Mobile Acceleration increases the content delivery speed by 30% on average.

Products.name: China Acceleration
Products.description: Connect your content with Chinese users

Products.name: Website Acceleration
Products.description: We cache your static files on servers close to end-users.
